verbs.description: summarize (third-person singular simple present summarizes, present participle summarizing, simple past and past participle summarized)

entries.meaning: (transitive, intransitive) To prepare a summary of (something).
examples: Jim was asked to summarize the document by Wednesday.

entries.meaning: (transitive, intransitive) To give a recapitulation of the salient facts; to recapitulate or review.
examples: After the meeting, Jim summarized the major decisions made.
